# Whelm, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Beguiler Spells|Beguiler 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Components:** V, S

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** One living creature/level

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 128

*With a sweep of your arm, creatures reel as an invisible surge of magical power invades their minds.*

This spell functions like *[[Whelm (Spell)|whelm]]**,* except that it affects multiple targets and it deals 1d6 points of nonlethal damage per caster level to each subject, to a maximum of 10d6 at 10th level.
